whatCouldWeAddToOurAppToMakeItBetterForO: What could we add to our app to make it better for our members?
noInternetMessage: We're having difficulty connecting to the server. Check your internet connection
yourViolationReportSubmitted: Your violation report has been submitted. Our representatives will contact you soon.
termsPara1: The following form is to be completed to gather more information about the Workplace Violation that you believe to have taken place. You answers along with the photo (optional) you are submitting will be sent directly to the Local Business Agent.
termsPara2: Please note that you are able to submit this Workplace Violation form anonymously or you can provide your contact information if you would like a follow up on the situation. If you submit this form anonymously you will not be contacted regarding the situation. Should you wish to receive an update on the situation, please allow 24-48 hours to hear back from the Business Agent assigned to the claim.
termsPara3: Should you have any immediate questions or concerns you can always contact us at support@linkedunion.com.
followUpMsg: I would like to request a follow up regarding the situation
grievanceProc:
Should this complaint be processed through the grievance procedure.
Please note,  if you are reporting anonymously you will not receive a direct follow-up regarding the situation.
attendExpenseTerms: I understand that if I attend any hearing on my behalf. I will do so at my own expense, and the Union will in no way be obligated for same.
notifyRequestMsg: I request notification of time, date and place of hearing in order to be present.
submitAnonymouslyNote: Please note that if you are reporting anonymously you will not receive a direct follow up regarding the situation.
submitAnonymously: SUBMIT THIS WORKPLACE VIOLATION CLAIM ANONYMOUSLY?
accessGallery: would like to access the Gallery
galleryPermission: Please grant permission to use the Gallery so you can upload photos.
dprInfoText: Submit OJT Hours no later than the 10th of each month. OJT Hours are due even if you have worked zero hours. Processing and verification of OJT Hours submissions take up to two weeks.
tutorialAlertText: This OJT Hours submission tutorial will walk you through the process of submitting your work hours. Follow these simple steps to ensure accurate reporting.
readyToSubmitText:
You are about to submit your OJT Hours. By clicking Submit, you agree that all hours are accurately recorded to the best of your knowledge.

kFlavour.unionName will receive copies of your submission once complete.
thankYouText: Your hours have been submitted to the kFlavour.unionName office.
youCanNotSubmitFutureHours: Sorry! You can't submit future work hours. Please select another day.
noValidWorkProcessWarning: Unfortunately, there are no valid Work Process Numbers against your craft. Please call us for assistance.
youHaveAlreadySelectedZeroWorkHours: You have already selected zero hours for this submission.
pleaseSubmitHoursToContinue: You cannot proceed without submitting hours. Kindly submit zero work hours if you have no hours to report.
youCanOnlyAddHoursForMonthYouSelectedPre: You can only add hours for the month that you selected previously.
hoursSubmitted: Hours have been submitted for approval
hoursSavedButNotSubmitted: Hours saved, but not submitted. Thank you!
ojtHoursareDueNoLaterThanTen: OJT Hours is due no later than the 10th of each month.
yourOjtHourWillBeReviewed: Your OJT Hours will be reviewed by the kFlavour.unionName office.
allPayRatesMustBeApproved: Pay raise are not solely based on the hours reported through the APP. All pay raises must be approved by the kFlavour.unionName
youCanNotAddMoreThan24Hours: Sorry! You can't add more than 24 hours in a day.
repeatThroughEndOfWeek: Repeat through the end of the week.
youHaveASavedOJTHoursForThisMonthIfYouPr: You have a saved OJT Hours for this month. If you proceed, your previous draft will be deleted.
youAlreadySubmittedAOJTHoursForThisEmplo: You already submitted a OJT Hours for this Employer.
pleaseClickOnTheCheckboxToConfirmTheAccu: Please click on the checkbox to confirm the accuracy of the hours submitted.
pleaseClickOnTheCheckboxToConfirmTheNumb: Please click on the checkbox to confirm the number of hours of (OJT).
warningYouEnteredHoursOnAHolidayProceedW: Warning! You entered hours on a Holiday. Proceed with submission?
rotateYourDeviceToLandscapeAndSignYourSi: Rotate your device to landscape mode and sign your signature.
iAttestThatTheHoursSubmittedAreAccurateT: I attest that the hours submitted are accurate to the best of my knowledge.
iCertifyThatTheNumberOfHoursOfOnTheJobTr: I certify that the number of hours of On-The-Job Training (OJT) is correctly stated in this submission.
cameraAccessTitle: would like to access the camera
cameraAccessText: Please grant permission to use the Camera so you can capture your profile picture.
